name: Sterculia
details: The remedy for the drinking habit. It promotes the appetite and digestion, and lessens the craving for liquor. ASTHMA. Gives power to endure prolonged physical exertion without taking food and without feeling fatigued.Neurasthenia. Regulates the circulation, is tonic and anti-diarrhoeic, regulates cardiac rhythm and acts diuretically. Weak heart.
dosage: Three to ten drops, even one dram doses, three times a day.
